name: Last Cannon
description:
We have only one cannon left in an asteroid field.
Thrusters are set to make the station turns on itself.
You are the colony's only hope.

Last Cannon is a top down shooter in which you control a station which turns on itself, you have to aim and time you shots carefully to hit the asteroids, survive and score has much as you can.

The game is an assignment with a one week deadline to make a game playable with only one button (others could be use for menus but not gameplay) and got a 14/20.
This version of the game has been modified to adjust the difficulty (The addition of ammunition to keep the player engaged and not cheese the game by spamming, to accommodate to this mechanic, the speed of the asteroids have been decreased, the speed of the station increased and its health decreased from 10 to 5 life points.)
